name: Poopi: Flushed Away
description:
Welcome to the 2d rage game with a unique theme, Poopi: Flushed Away! 

In this platformer, you must make your way past man tricky obstacles to get to the top. However, there are no checkpoints, so when you mess up its time to start all the way over again! Can you beat it, or will you let the game beat you? 

FIND OUT!
